pr_title: Return LocalTime for valueTime in Form Recognizer

timeline.bodyText: if getValueTime() returns null will this still work? I've seen inputs where the time was extracted from the receipt as not a real time, e.g. '36:54:47 PM', and then although the field type is set to "time" it returns null for valueTime.
timeline.author: kristapratico

replies.bodyText: How will that scenario look in the swagger? do you have an example?
replies.author: maririos

replies.bodyText: Will send to you guys in chat since the example is a personal receipt
replies.author: kristapratico

replies.bodyText: Updated to add a null check before parsing, thanks Krista!
replies.author: samvaity
